     DESCRIPTION:

    Experience the speed, celebrity, excellence! Exciting racing back to GRID 2 - continuation of the award-winning BAFTA game Race Driver: GRID with millions of fans. You will fight hard 
for places, intelligent AI opponents and total immersion in the atmosphere of the race. With the new control system GRID 2 TrueFeel Ã¢â€žÂ¢, bordering with reality, you literally feel like a pilot set of legendary racing cars! Next-generation gaming technology EGO provides stunning graphics and stunning damage. Be yourself on three continents in the new dynamic world of motorsport to gain prominence, fans and wealth, rushing forward to victory in intense, relentless race to the licensed tracks, perfectly realized city streets and mountain turns deadly. GRID 2 sets a new standard for racing for several players, offering innovative modes, a completely separate system of progress and integration with RaceNet, a free online addition to racing games Codemasters. GRID 2 - a new word in the race.
